snippet.title: The North Trailer
snippet.description:
The North is a PS1 style exploration game. Talk to NPCs and try to solve a murder onboard an arctic exploration ship trapped in the ice. You play as Doctor David Barclay, the ship's surgeon and the one man above suspicion. Talk to the crew to get clues but beware, you are not a well liked or respected member of the HMS Ectorius.

5 levels and several alternative endings. Game play is that of a 3D visual novel

Download it for free:
https://phagemaleficar.itch.io/the-north
